text: Sita Falls is a waterfall located in Ranchi district in the Indian state of Jharkhand. ==Description== The Sita fall is in Radhu river which is a tributary of the Radhu River. The falls drop from . ==Location== Sita Falls located in Ranchi district. It is at east of Ranchi in Ranchi-Purulia road or NH-32. ==References== Category:Waterfalls of Jharkhand Category:Ranchi district
title: Sita Falls
